name: attendee-retrieve
subject: Your registration for [[event.display_name]]
body:
Greetings,

Thank you for registering for **[[event.display_name]]**. Your [[badge_type_name]] registration for **[[display_name]]** has been completed.

Your badge will be available for pickup at the event. Please bring a photo ID and a displayable copy of this email message with you.

![QR Code for [[badge_id_display]]]([[qr_data_uri]])

You can review your order at any time at the following link:

[My Badges]([[retrieve_url]])

Thanks again,
[[event-name]] Registration
